output.dependency: The type of beer (American Pale Wheat Ale) in one column determines the style of the beer described in another column.

The specified size of the beverage (16.0 ounce or variations) in one column appears consistent with the alcohol content representation in another column, where the format of the values indicates the same unit or type.
The brewery name in one column suggests the location (city) in another column, indicating that the brewery is located in that city.
The city in one column indicates a geographic region represented by its state in another column.
